issue.title: thestreameast.to
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Annoyance) [http://thestreameast.to](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=http%3A%2F%2Fthestreameast.to) ### Comment > Streameast is the largest sports streaming site and blocking pop up’s is no longer working. > > On iPhone AdGuard used to work with default filters and completely blocked popups. > > Lately it only worked at blocking popups with annoyance filters on. > > Now it doesn’t work no matter what filters are on. > > The attached screenshot is the website that pops up now on about half the clicks of the video player. > > Fully updated app and filter list on fully updated iPhone. > > I love using AdGuard so I hope they can make my sports watching experience ad free again. ### Screenshots

### Внимание

Эта проблема решается с помощью расширения [AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra).

Если вы используете AdGuard для Windows, Mac или Android, пожалуйста, убедитесь, что AdGuard Extra включен в настройках программы.

Если вы используете браузерное расширение AdGuard, мы рекомендуем установить AdGuard Extra в дополнение к нему.

* [Установить в Chrome, Edge или другой браузер на основе Chromium](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)

issue.title: Block 3utilities.com
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard Browser Extension

### AdGuard version

4.2.151

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Dangerous site

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Firefox

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

pois-net.3utilities.com

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

`3utilities.com` has long been used for phishing with revolving subdomain. `pois-net.3utilities.com` will redirect to legit site if your UA is not mobile (my concern is rather on whether the domain would be alive when you look at this).

### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition
